means: 对立面，对立物，相反的人[事物]

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"相反的，对立的"之意。
means: opposite ： 指位置、方向、行动或想法等完全相反。
contrary ： 一般指与某种主张、看法或行为等正好相反，隐含否定一方并不意味着肯定另一方的意味。
adverse ： 通常指违害利益的、无生命的势力或条件等，侧重分歧。
reverse ： 指朝相反方向的或反面(背面)的。
converse ： 指在方向、行动或意见上相反的。

sentence.Network_en: The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

sentence.Network_en: A string of five rowing boats set out from the opposite bank.
sentence.Network_cn: 5只划艇排成一行从对岸出发了。

sentence.Network_en: The two politicians represent opposite poles of the political spectrum.
sentence.Network_cn: 这两位从政者代表了政界的两个极端。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 相字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 相对论〖 relativity〗 相反〖 opposite;contrary〗 相仿〖 similar〗.
对字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 对路〖 satisfytheneed〗 对面〖 opposite;facetoface;rightinfront〗 当面〖 directlyfront〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... juxtapose v 并列，并置 opposite a 相对的 repose n 休息；睡眠.
赤砂之蝎_百度百科 ... N——ninja 忍者 O——opposite 相反的 P——puppet 傀儡.

list.abs: 【资源】英语常用短语 ... operation on sp. 在某位置动手术 opposite direction 相反方向 or rather 或者说、更进一步说.
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... opposite interior angle 内对角 opposite side 对边 optimal solution 最优解.
opposition的翻译查词例句... ... break down opposition 打破障碍 in opposition 在野 in opposition to 与...相反; 反对.
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... operation 运算 opposite angle 对角 opposite interior angle 内对角.

jx.jx_en_mean: women in relation to men or vice versa

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin oppositus, past participle of opponere 'set against'

entry.def: If one thing is opposite another, it is on the other side of a space from it.

example.ex: Jennie had sat opposite her at breakfast.
example.tran: 珍妮吃早餐时坐在她对面。

entry.def: The opposite side or part of something is the side or part that is furthest away from you.

entry.tran: （同一类事物）截然相反的，全然不同的
entry.def: Opposite is used to describe things of the same kind which are completely different in a particular way. For example, north and south are opposite directions, and winning and losing are opposite results in a game.

example.ex: All the cars driving in the opposite direction had their headlights on...
example.tran: 对面开来的车都打着头灯。

example.ex: I should have written the notes in the opposite order...
example.tran: 我本应按相反的顺序记笔记的。

entry.def: The opposite of someone or something is the person or thing that is most different from them.

example.ex: Ritter was a very complex man but Marius was the opposite, a simple farmer...
example.tran: 里特城府颇深，而马里厄斯恰恰相反，是个心地淳朴的农民。

example.ex: Well, whatever he says you can bet he's thinking the opposite...
example.tran: 呃，不管他说什么，你都可以肯定他想的完全是另一套。

means.word_mean: 1. two words that express opposing concepts;

sentences.sentence: "to him the opposite of gay was depressed"
"we thought Sue was older than Bill but just the reverse was true"

means.word_mean: 3. a contestant that you are matched against
4. something inverted in sequence or character or effect;

sentences.sentence: "when the direct approach failed he tried the inverse"

means.word_mean: 1. being directly across from each other; facing;

sentences.sentence: "And I on the opposite shore will be, ready to ride and spread the alarm"- Longfellow
"we lived on opposite sides of the street"
"at opposite poles"

means.word_mean: 2. of leaves etc; growing in pairs on either side of a stem;

sentences.sentence: "opposite leaves"

means.word_mean: 3. moving or facing away from each other;

sentences.sentence: "looking in opposite directions"
"they went in opposite directions"

means.word_mean: 4. the other one of a complementary pair;

sentences.sentence: "the opposite sex"
"the two chess kings are set up on squares of opposite colors"

means.word_mean: 5. altogether different in nature or quality or significance;

sentences.sentence: "the medicine's effect was opposite to that intended"
"it is said that opposite characters make a union happiest"- Charles Reade

means.word_mean: 6. characterized by opposite extremes; completely opposed;

sentences.sentence: "in diametric contradiction to his claims"
"diametrical (or opposite) points of view"
"opposite meanings"
"extreme and indefensible polar positions"
"the two photographs lay face-to-face on the table"
"lived all their lives in houses face-to-face across the street"
"they sat opposite at the table"

auth_sentence.content: It's the opposite of the 'social model'.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's the opposite of the 'social model'.

auth_sentence.content: Non-disabled people Is a simple opposite to disabled people.
auth_sentence.res_content: Non-disabled people Is a simple opposite to disabled people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Non-disabled people Is a simple opposite to disabled people.

auth_sentence.content: Opposite meaning of what they're trying to say.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opposite meaning of what they're trying to say.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opposite meaning of what they're trying to say.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 作品,作文,乐曲;作曲;结构,组成,成分
stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+pos放+ition表名词→放到一起→组合→作文
com一起+pos放+ure表名词→[精神]放到一起→镇静

stems_affixes.value_cn: 暴露, 揭露, 暴光
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pos放+ure表名词→放到外面→暴露
op对+pos放+ite表名词→n.相反的事物
pos放+ture状态→放的状态→姿势→态度
sup在下面+pos放+ition表名词→放在下面的[想法]→推测

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令取某种姿势, 摆姿势, 作出姿态
stems_affixes.word_buile: pos放+ture状态→放的状态→姿势→态度

Sentence.sentence: Speakers or English have a similar gesture through the hand may not be cupped and the fingers may be held more loosely, but for them the gesture means goodbye or go away, quite the opposite of the Colombian gesture.
The general principle is simple: whenever the body has been in one position for a while, it is good to briefly stretch it in an opposite position.
they are actually in opposite directions.
The urge to explore space is just the opposite.
Are teenagers in particular, do you think, sheltered too much from contact with the opposite sex?
Well, I would like to find the parents who could shelter girls from the opposite sex if they live in Oxford

means.word_mean: (表示位置)在…的对面; 在旁边, 接着; 与…在一排

sentences.en: The post office is opposite (to) the station.
Opposite his own name was a small tick.
sentences.cn: 紧接在他名字后面的是一个小对号。

sentences.en: The man wrote fifty dollars opposite the word “value”.
sentences.cn: 那人在价值一词的同一行写下了50美元。

sentences.en: He has played opposite her in many productions.
sentences.cn: 他与她联合主演了许多影片。

sentences.en: I think the picture would look better on the opposite wall.
sentences.cn: 我认为这张画挂在对面的墙上会好看些。

means.word_mean: 对立面, 对立物, 相反的人[事物]

sentences.en: The chief of the group has gone over to the opposite.
sentences.cn: 那个组织的头头归降了对方。

jushi.english: There's a couple with a dog who live opposite.
jushi.chinese: 对面住着一对夫妇,养着一条狗。

jushi.english: The woman sitting opposite is a detective.
jushi.chinese: 坐在对面的女子是个侦探。
